pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Estimation Based on the Compound Covariate Method Under the Cox Proportional Hazard Model // Calculate regression coefficients and their standard deviations under the Cox proportional hazard model with a large number of covariates. A shrinkage type estimation based on the compound covariate method (Emura, Chen Chen, 2012 PLoS ONE) and a univariate gene selection method under dependent censoring (Emura Chen, 2014 Statistical Methods in Medical Research) are implemented. Algorithms for simulating gene expressions in these references are also given.
